text: Jing Kevin Chen is an electrical engineer at the Hong Kong University of Science and Technology in Hong Kong. Chen was named a Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2014 for his contributions to compound semiconductor heterojunction transistor technologies. == References == Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Living people Category:Hong Kong University of Science and Technology faculty Category:Chinese engineers Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Jing Kevin Chen
